mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${tableName}` ( `id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '榜单id', `user_id` BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '学生id', `points` INT NOT NULL COMMENT '积分值', `rank` INT NOT NULL COMMENT '名次，只记录赛季前100', `season` INT NOT NULL COMMENT '赛季，例如 1,就是第一赛季，2-就是第二赛季', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_user_id` (`user_id`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_season` (`season`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_rank` (`rank`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT ='学霸天梯榜' COLLATE = 'utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci' ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, points, `rank`, season FROM `${tableName}` WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND season = #{season} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = (SELECT DATABASE()) AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
